message: I remember hearing from the Mysterium presentation that Jungle Island had far less work done on it than other parts of the game.  Has significant work been done on it since then?  I think a completed jungle area or village complex would really impress Cyan...

Jungle Island is more or less the same as it was at Mysterium. We poke at it every now and then, but we're still mainly focused on polishing up smaller areas. Fear not, we haven't forgotten about it. :)
I don't see anybody forgetting about that nightmare
One of our previous team members is still lost in that area. Been there for so long we didn't bother mentioning that member at Mysterium anymore...
If you'd like a peek: http://cl.ly/0G0t3E0c043z0z0t3L3G
Those are pretty much finalized, production graphics.
Oh my gosh... Floating huts! That's certainly one thing the original Riven could not offer us.
